title: (x) Haines & Associates classic serif caps - Classic Caps {Bart H}
content:
Can anyone ID this font?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907031222im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/haines_4142.png)

Seems like I should know this one, but don’t.

Any ideas for a similar alternative to Trajan? (slight serif, traditional looking but not standard)

Thanks,  
Z

 [‹ (x) MCFCU sloped soft semiserif - Mirarae {Adriano S}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907031222/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38453 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Freakshow sturdy serif face with swashes - ITC Bookman Swash {Norbert} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907031222/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38454 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Zelavi
